types.section:
{{fr-verb}}

# {{lb|fr|transitive}} to [[take]]
#: {{uxi|fr|'''prends''' ma main|t=take my hand}}
# {{lb|fr|transitive}} to [[eat]]; to [[drink]]
#: {{uxi|fr|elle '''prend''' un café|t=she is drinking a coffee}}
# {{lb|fr|transitive}} to [[get]]; to [[buy]]
#: {{uxi|fr|Je vais '''prendre''' le plat du jour.|I'll '''get''' the dish of the day.}}
# {{lb|fr|transitive}} to [[rob]]; to [[deprive]]
#: {{uxi|fr|'''prendre''' quelque chose à quelqu'un|t=to '''take''' something from someone}}
# {{lb|fr|transitive}} to [[make]]
#: {{uxi|fr|'''prendre''' une décision|to [[make a decision]]}}
#: {{uxi|fr|'''prendre''' des mesures draconiennes|to take [[draconian]] measures}}
# {{lb|fr|intransitive}} to [[catch]], to [[work]], to [[start]]
#: {{uxi|fr|le feu ne '''prend''' pas|the fire won't start}}
#: {{uxi|fr|la sauce ne '''prend''' pas|the sauce isn't thickening}}
#: {{uxi|fr|ma mayonnaise ne '''prend''' pas|my mayonnaise isn't setting}}
#: {{uxi|fr|ça ne '''prend''' pas avec moi|that won't wash with me}}
# {{lb|fr|reflexive}} to get (something) caught (in), to [[jam]]
#: {{uxi|fr|je me suis '''pris''' la main dans la porte|t=I caught my hand in the door}}
#: {{uxi|fr|je me suis '''pris''' la porte dans la figure|t=the door hit me in the face}}
# {{lb|fr|intransitive}} to [[get into]], to [[come over]] {{gl|to cause to behave uncharacteristically, to affect in a surprising manner, to possess}} {{+obj|fr|à<someone>}}
#: {{uxi|fr|Qu'est-ce qui t'a '''pris''' ? Qu'est-ce qui t'est passé par la tête ? |What were you thinking? What got into you? What came over you?}}
#: {{uxi|fr|Qu'est-ce qui lui a '''pris''' ? Quelle mouche l'a piqué ?|What was he thinking? What got into him?}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[bien lui en prit]]|t=good for him; it was a good choice|lit=he took it well}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[mal lui en prit]]|t=too bad for him; it was a bad choice|lit=he took it badly}}
# {{lb|fr|transitive||in various|_|idiomatic|_|expressions}} to start having a negative [[feeling]] towards someone
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre en aversion]]|take an aversion (to)}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre en grippe]]|take a dislike (to)}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre en dégoût]]|become disgusted (by)}}
# {{lb|fr|followed by a [[partitive]]|in various|_|idiomatic|_|expressions}} to [[gain]]
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de la vitesse]]|to gain speed}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre du galon]]|to gain a promotion}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de l'avance]]|to gain ground}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre du retard]]|to fall behind schedule, to run late, to drop behind}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de la hauteur]]|to gain some perspective}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre du recul]]|to take a step back}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de la bouteille]]|to gain experience}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[en prendre de la graine]]|to take away a lesson}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre du poids]]|to gain weight}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de la masse]]|to build muscle}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de la brioche]], [[prendre du bide]], [[prendre du ventre]]|to get a [[paunch]]}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre du bouchon]]|to fail}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de l'élan]]|to gain momentum}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de l'âge]]|to get older}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de la valeur]]|to gain value}}
#: {{uxi|fr|[[prendre de l'importance]]|to become important}}
# {{lb|fr|colloquial|;|impersonal}} to [[take]] {{gl|a certain amount of time}}
#: {{syn|fr|[[falloir]]}}
#: {{ux|fr|Ça va me prendre au moins deux heures pour le mettre à jour.
|It's going to take me at least two hours to update it.}}
# {{lb|fr|colloquial|;|impersonal|;|by extension}} to [[take]] {{gl|a certain number or amount of}}
#: {{syn|fr|[[falloir]]}}
#: {{ux|fr|Pour finir dans deux heures, '''ça prend''' trois personnes.|To finish in two hours, it'll '''take''' three people.}}
# {{lb|fr|impersonal}} to [[come over]] {{gl|to arise in and gain some control over one's thoughts and/or actions}}
#: {{uxi|fr|il prend [quelque chose] à [quelqu'un]|[something] '''comes over''' [someone]}}
#: {{ux|fr|Il lui prend une fantaisie de mettre le feu à la maison.
|t=A fancy comes over him to set fire to the house.}}
#* {{quote-text|fr|year=2015|author=Zaz|title=Si jamais j'oublie
|passage=Et s'il me '''prend''' l'envie d' m'en aller, enferme-moi et jette la clé.|t=And if I '''feel like''' leaving, lock me up and throw away the key.}}
